title: I'm having fun in Twisted Treeline.
body: I started Twisted Treeline recently with a friend and we've been having a lot of fun. I've been spamming alistar top/support

replies.body: all they gotta do is revert it to the old one and we good.

> [{quoted}](name=Nekorus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u0QATrT4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-07-15T04:06:43.229+0000)
>
> all they gotta do is revert it to the old one and we good.

Nah the old one was worse. Thin walls so any champ without a jump was massively outclassed, random buffs could make or break a game, you could easily pull minions into the fountain at base so taking an enemy inhib was detrimental, could also easily pull players into fountain with someone like blitz or naut making games take forever to close out. There were other issues I can think of off the top of my head.

Username checks out :P

...On a more serious note, you might, but extremely few people do. Hence, it's abysmal playrate.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u0QATrT4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-15T03:20:44.828+0000)
>
> Username checks out :P
> 
> ...On a more serious note, you might, but extremely few people do. Hence, it's abysmal playrate.

Kinda sad noone plays it. Maybe with a rework or something people will play it more.

> [{quoted}](name=A Sutpid Idot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u0QATrT4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-07-15T03:22:42.883+0000)
>
> Kinda sad noone plays it. Maybe with a rework or something people will play it more.

Nah just to much focus on competitive rift there is no focus on TT and its sad.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u0QATrT4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-15T03:20:44.828+0000)
>
> Username checks out :P
> 
> ...On a more serious note, you might, but extremely few people do. Hence, it's abysmal playrate.

I actually enjoy TT. I like playing TT rank to.

More champion bans are needed to make the gameplay experience of TT enjoyable. There are just champions that were never balanced around a smaller map with lots of walls which is why kayn, poppy, zac, fiddlesticks just to name a few are really oppresive to play against.

> [{quoted}](name=Ilovemobas,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u0QATrT4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-07-15T03:41:59.064+0000)
>
> More champion bans are needed to make the gameplay experience of TT enjoyable. There are just champions that were never balanced around a smaller map with lots of walls which is why kayn, poppy, zac, fiddlesticks just to name a few are really oppresive to play against.

I don't really think poppy is that bad IMO. Kayn talon and zac are the most oppressive for me

> [{quoted}](name=A Sutpid Idot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u0QATrT4,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-07-15T03:43:05.878+0000)
>
> I don't really think poppy is that bad IMO. Kayn talon and zac are the most oppressive for me

Poppy is not objectively  overpowered i never said that but is is way too easy to get a wall stun off. Just uninteractive really.
